content: this tank is a way for me to give back to you my friends the community i didn t know i needed- thank you i am so overwhelmed with how this art has connected me with people i truly cannot imagine my life without i am so thankful for you i hope you enjoy this pattern i also wrote this pattern to help spread awareness about size inclusive collective 1 - a wonderful resource for people of all sizes to help promote grading advocacy in our industry so that *every body* can have access to well written great fitting patterns please note financial inclusivity is just as important as size inclusivity www yarnsub com is a great resource for a wide range of substitutes to fit any budget honestly anything lofty with lots of fuzz or bloom will work fine for this pattern- just swatch and see intended to be worn with 1-3 /2 5-7 5 negative ease modeled with 1 /2 5 cm negative ease front and back are knit flat joined at the shoulders with a three-needle bind off then seamed at the sides neckline and optional armhole finishing are picked up and knit in the round body is shaped with a subtle a-line to skim the hips gently while also not creating too much fabric for tucking note to convert majority of tank to the round simply cast on 4 less than the cast on for front + back & bind off 2 less at each underarm for initial bind off if you love this pattern and my work please consider supporting my work by checking out my other paid patterns and/or leaving some comments on my instagram page danish translation here 2 1 https //www instagram com/sizeinclusivecollective/ 2 https //strikkeglad dk/52733/min-yndlingstop/
